name: HyperSpace Dark (CSharpner)
description:
A nice, clean, dark theme for HyperSpace.app

[Update 2019-04-14]
Lots more items darkened.  This is a very difficult site to darken.

user.name: csharpner
user.about:
I've been developing software my whole life.  Making themes is a new, side hobby of mine.  I prefer dark themes because they incur less strain on my eyes, drain less power from my mobile devices, and just plain look better (to me, anyway).

I accept donations via BitCoin:
bc1qdl3fflut4khf48umrrtxkmkug2vcvmmk3pd8n7

additional_info: This is a beta version of my dark theme for HyperSpace.app.  I've included comments on everything.
